text: 5.2 Kis 29.18, Wkp 1.9, Sng 40.6, Jon 13.34, Lom 14.15, 2 Ko 2.15, Gal 2.20, Hib 7.27, 10.10, 1 Jo 3.11, 3.23 Klays chɨnop mapen lup tek ak gɨnɨmɨb. Chɨnop mapen lɨl, bɨ kɨli God nop tap kuy tep owep sɨbog ñɨbal tek ak, chɨnop nen mab bak alaŋ kumak. Anɨb ak tek binɨb okok kɨlop mapen lɨlɨg yenɨmɨb.
